long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every year, over $10 billion is lost to scams, and even more through unethical practices hidden in website terms and conditions. Most people rarely read the terms of use or privacy policies they agree to.
Our extension helps safeguard your finances and peace of mind by identifying unexpected subscriptions, unrecognized payments, hidden fees, and more.
